channel.title: Masks: Campaign Starters & Locations: Gauntlet Blog
channel.description:
![masks ang|690x361](upload://dpffUEBkpJMDFx5zIY0c15sb2A4.jpeg) On the Gauntlet Blog I look at two *Masks: A New Generation* campaigns I've started and offers a set of new location-based moves for this teen supers rpg, including A Visit to The Fixer, Down at the Mall, Competitions with Rivals, and more.
You can find that here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/masks-campaign-starters-locations Find the full blog back catalog here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog-table-of-contents.html
